categories.title: Sandwiches
categories.desc: The sandwiches are to die for as well as the pastries, they were fresh and filled with flavour.

items.title: Chicken Ceasar
items.desc: Tender chicken pieces with bacon, havarti, tomatoes, arugula and our homemade Caesar dressing. Served on our Dynamite Cheddar, jalapeno & chive bread

items.title: Ham and Cheese
items.desc: Slices of ham with cheddar, tomatoes, arugula and our home made lemon chive mayonnaise. Served on our Dynamite Rosemary bread

items.title: Tuna Melt
items.desc: Flaked tuna mixed with diced pickles, onions, celery, carrots, smoked paprika, dill and mayonnaise. Topped with cheddar and arugula. Served on our Dynamite dill, potato and caramelized onion bread

items.title: Pickle Melt
items.desc: Tempura battered pickle with caramelized onions, cheddar, arugula and a spicy mayo. Served on our Dynamite Cheddar, jalapeno & chive bread

categories.title: Bread
categories.desc: Sourdough or Pain au Levain, are dense delicious naturally leavened breads with a very delicate tang.

items.title: Cranberry & Nine Grain
items.desc: This bread has a light tanginess and lingering earthy flavour.

items.title: Oat & Honey
items.desc: Organic whole wheat flour, levain, sea salt, water, honey and rolled oat soaker, a few flax seeds.

items.title: Crazy Grain
items.desc: Equal parts of wheat, rye and spelt with a multitude of grains, blackstrap molasse, local honey and a touch of buttermilk for the fluffiness.

items.title: Potato Buttermilk
items.desc: Earthy sweetness of roasted Yukon Gold potatoes complemented with a silky and chewy texture. This moist and tender loaf has a thinner, softer crust.
